Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: a capacious meadow

A capacious meadow stretches out before you in swathes of long grass, flowers and the occasional boulder spotted here and there. It is surrounded on all sides bar one by dense brambles bushes with a long, undulating cave along the eastern side. Upon closer inspection you see the cardinal directions are filled with numerous representations of the elements: the cave to the northeast for air, the fire pit to the southeast for fire, the pool to the southwest for water, and the herb garden to the northwest for earth. A single, large oak tree stands centrally within the meadow with a toadstool ring at it's foot. A small tunnel large enough to fit through leads into the cave to the northeast and a path through the brambles to the west.
A capacious meadow stretches out before you. A small tunnel large enough to fit through leads into the cave to the northeast and a path through the brambles to the west.

A capacious meadow stretches out before you in swathes on long grass and flowers; items representing the elements reside in the four corners. A small tunnel large enough to fit through leads into the cave to the northeast and a path through the brambles to the west.
path into the cave
path through the brambles
the lower branch

The lower branch of the oak tree gives enough leverage into the high canopy. It juts out the side, thick by half a meter, this provides enough space to perch upon. The branch is bare and tapers into elegant swathes of smaller branches that meshes into the canopy above.
The lower branch of the oak tree gives enough leverage into the high canopy.
the dense canopy

A sprawling maze of branches makes up the dense canopy of the oak tree. Criss-crossing swathes of smaller branches and twigs create a roof effective of adequate shelter for those who wish to sit within. It overshadows a ring of toadstools at the base of the tree.
The dense canopy of the oak tree provides space enough to sit within; it overshadows a ring of toadstools at the base.
the strips of driftwood
Length of driftwood litter the surface of the small pool and strip of sand. It is discolored from time at sea and encrusted with salt and seaweed.
Length of driftwood litter the surface of the small pool and strip of sand.
herb garden

A small, compact herb garden sits in the northwestern corner of the meadow; it is ringed with a collection of rocks. Within the garden you see an array of plants: eucalyptus, clove, thyme, mint and sage. Each have properties specific to the purpose of the meadow and appears to be well-tended.
A small, compact herb garden sits in the northwestern corner of the meadow; it is ringed with a collection of rocks.
small pool

A small pool seeps in from the southwest, allowing a small patch of sea with which to fish. Occasionally, the odd piece of driftwood and seashell decorates the water, causing it to twinkle in the light of day. A thin strip of sand rings the area; there is enough room to sit.
A small pool seeps in from the southwest, allowing a small patch of sea with which to fish.
the rocks

Two collections of rocks reside in the meadow; one circles the herb garden, the other the fire pit. They come in an array of different sizes, but provide enough protection from the long stems of grass.
Two collections of rocks reside in the meadow; one circles the herb garden, the other the fire pit.
the rocks circling the fire pit

Numerous misshapen rocks circle the perimeter of the fire pit, keeping long stems of grass alighting from the activity within. However, not all blades of grass have been lucky, you see singed grass and discoloration here and there.
Numerous misshapen rocks circle the perimeter of the fire pit, keeping long stems of grass alighting from the activity within.
the rocks circling the herb garden
Numerous misshapen rocks circle the perimeter of the herb garden, keeping long stems of grass at bay from the well-tended soil. Here, the grass has become soiled, giving is a light brownish hue.
Numerous misshapen rocks circle the perimeter of the herb garden, keeping long stems of grass at bay from the well-tended soil.
the sand circling the pool
Fine sand circles the edge of the small pool, providing room on which to sit. Stray bits of driftwood and cracked seashells give life to the otherwise drab strip of crystallized rock.
Fine sand circles the edge of the small pool, providing room on which to sit.
the cracked seashells

Various cracked and colored seashells decoratively add life to the otherwise strip of sand surrounding the small pool. Some have strayed forth and tangle in the long stems of grass, causing unsuspecting passers-by to step on the sharp shards.
Various cracked and colored seashells decoratively add life to the otherwise strip of sand surrounding the small pool.
mushroom-top toadstool

A mushroom-top toadstool is one of many of the ring at the foot of the large oak tree; the surface is colored red with white spots and stalk. It is said that fairies come to snatch you away if you step within the circle.
A mushroom-top toadstool is one of many of the ring at the foot of the large oak tree; the surface is colored red with white spots and stalk.
ring of mushroom-top toadstools

A ring of mushroom-top toadstools sit to the side of the oak tree; the surface is colored red with white spots and stalk. The grass is surprisingly healthy in the centre. It is said that fairies come to snatch you away if you step within the circle.
A ring of mushroom-top toadstools sit to the side of the oak tree; the surface is colored red with white spots and stalk.
large oak tree

A large oak tree stands in the very center of the meadow, it's canopy shading those who wish to rest beneath. A branch down the side of the tree allows a foothold up into the high canopy. On the face of the tree the bark is contorted into what looks like a face; it has two gaping eyes, a knobbly nose and wide, tapering lips.
A large oak tree stands in the very center of the meadow, it's canopy shading those who wish to rest beneath.
flat eastern wall

The eastern wall is comprised of the outer, west side of the cave; it is smooth and undulating. To the northeastern end a draft escapes the path into the cave; it is low-standing, but easy enough to enter and exit through.
The eastern wall is comprised of the outer, west side of the cave; it is smooth and undulating.
the northern bramble wall
The northern wall of brambles line one of three sides of the meadow. The bushes are dense and bare thorns that would prick any stray fingers.
The northern wall of brambles line one of three sides of the meadow.
the southern bramble wall
The southern wall of brambles line one of three sides of the meadow. The bushes are dense and bare thorns that would prick any stray fingers. A section to the southwest gives way to a small pool.
The southern wall of brambles line one of three sides of the meadow. A section to the southwest gives way to a small pool.
the western bramble wall
The western wall of brambles line one of three sides of the meadow. The bushes are dense and bare thorns that would prick any stray fingers. A path through the brambles can be glimpsed here.
The western wall of brambles line one of three sides of the meadow. A path through the brambles can be glimpsed here.
the dense brambles

Dense brambles surround the entirety of the meadow aside from the eastern cave wall. The bushes are dense and bare thorns that would prick any stray fingers. To the southwest there is space enough for a small pool to seep in and a path leads out through the west.
Dense brambles surround the entirety of the meadow aside from the eastern cave wall.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: "\{You feel the heat rise up from the hard dry \{ground\|earth\}.\| The \{hot\|burning\|sweltering\} sun beats down on your back.\| The \{heat\|warmth\} of the sun brings out the worst \{smells\|scents\|odors\} of \{the city\|docktown\}.\}"

"\{Rain \{pours\|falls\} down from \{over head\|above\|the sky\}.\|Several lightning bolts lance down from \{over head\|above\|the sky\} striking in the distance.\| A loud clap of thunder sounds, sending vibrations through the ground, shaking you.\|\{A series of lightning\|A lightning bolt\} streaks across \{over head\|above\|the sky\} spreading out like fingers on a hand.\| Lightning emblazons the sky spreading a \{eerie\|ominous\} white glow on everything around you.\| The rain \{lightens\|calms\|weakens\} for a moment before a \{clap\|shock\|boom\} of thunder ushers it's heavy return.\| The dark clouds billow ominously \{over head\|above\|through the sky\}, sending rain falling down in waves.\| The wind blows the rain harshly \{against your face\|in your eyes\}.\|A heavy blast of rain forces you to \{close your eyes.\|turn your face\}.\}"
"miscellaneous vegetation and fish with a salty tang"
